news.html: Got outstanding reviewer award for CVPR'20 and ECCV'20 :)
Two papers accepted, on object segmentation and tracking (ECCV'20, arxiv) and video-saliency segmentation (BMVC'20, arxiv). Congrats to the team!
I was selected for participation at Robotics Science and Systems (RSS) 2020 Pioneers event!
We are organizing a workshop at ECCV'2020 "Tracking and its many guises"! Web-page
Our paper "How to Train your Deep Multi-Object Tracker" accepted to CVPR'2020! Paper
Our paper "4D Generic Video Object Proposals" accepted to ICRA'2020! Paper
We are organizing a workshop on Multi-Object Tracking and Segmentation at CVPR'2020 in Seattle!
Successfully defended my Ph.D. thesis "Vision-based Category Agnostic Object Tracking for Mobile Robots and Intelligent Vehicles" with the highest distinction (summa cum laude)! Yay!

teaching.html: IN2157: Fundamental Algorithms (TU Munich, lecturer) coming soon!
IN2375: Computer Vision 3: Detection, Segmentation and Tracking (TU Munich, guest lecturer) Lectures avalible on YouTube
IN2157: Fundamental Algorithms (TU Munich, lecturer) TUM Moodle, IN2375: Computer Vision 3: Detection, Segmentation and Tracking (TU Munich, guest lecturer)

service.html: Reviewer for (machine learning, vision conferences) CVPR, ECCV, ICCV, BMVC, NeurIPS, ICML; (robotics conferences) ICRA, IROS, RSS; (journals) IJCV, RAL, TPAMI
Co-organizer for workshops: 5th BMTT MOTChallenge Workshop: Multi-Object Tracking and Segmentation (CVPR'20), Tracking and its many guises (ECCV'20).
Super-honored to be on the ECCV'24 organization team!
I am in RSS Pioneers 2021 program committee!
